Node.definition: = the meaning of this word is uncertain and can only be deduced from its etymology; possible interpretations include: a song that shows understanding, by which the understanding either refers to the structure or to the contents of this song; or: a song that gives understanding; or: a meditation
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a large open place on the side of a rock or mountain, ► used for burying and hiding, or as a temporary dwelling place
= action by which humans speak to a deity, often by raising their hands, ► requesting help or expressing their thankfulness
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to beg for mercy|to make supplication
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans try to win a favorable attitude from deities or from other humans ◄ by approaching that deity or person in a very humble way
literally: to pour our (one's) complaint; hence: = action by which humans give full vent to their complaints
= a process by which humans go through extremely difficult circumstances, resulting in severe anxiety, ◄ as if one were confined to a narrow and cramped space from which there is no escape
= state in which humans are totally without inner strength; ◄ caused by physical or non physical suffering
= inner person of a human or celestial being, associated with emotions, such as joy, grief, worry, courage, anger, willingness, etc.
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
literally: to know; hence: = state in which humans or deities are actively involved in circumstances relating to the life of humans and animals and care for their well being
= a pattern of behavior, with a primary focus on moral and ethical behavior, ◄ understood as a journey through life
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move through an area without a specific destination
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or objects to be invisible so that their location cannot be determined, which is often achieved by burying them or by covering them
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which humans or deities show a favorable attitude to (other) humans

Node.gloss: to vanish|to disappear|to be lost|to perish|to be broken|to be destroyed|to be ruined
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects disappear or are removed from existence;◄ either by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, natural processes, acts of destruction, or direct divine intervention

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
= action by which humans and deities are actively engaged in pursuing the well being of people and/or objects

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= action by which humans raise their voice ◄ in times of hardship ► hoping to receive help from God or someone else
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= person in whom one has put one's trust; ◄ because of difficult circumstances; ► in order to find protection or safety
= someone with whom one has a close, affectionate, and exclusive relationship ◄ as if it were a private possession

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= state in which humans and deities are alive and well, ◄ which, for humans, requires the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= action by which humans or deities pay close attention in order to be able to hear what (other) humans might be saying, or to pick up other sounds and react to if needed

= process by which an individual or group of people is reduced to a state of insignificance and becomes powerless to help oneself ◄ due to difficult circumstances such as poverty, sickness, and warfare
= causative action by which humans or deities remove (other) humans or objects from a dangerous or life threatening situation

Node.gloss: to be strong|to be powerful|to prevail
Node.definition: = state in which humans have political and/or military strength

Node.gloss: to bring out|to take out|to carry out|to make (someone) leave|to make (someone) depart
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans, animals, or objects to leave a certain place or position
= place where criminals or other prisoners were confined

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= action by which humans publicly admit their own shortcomings before God, or the shortcomings of the people they represent

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being
= state in which a person's or deity's behavior is fully consistent with the requirements of the law, either in a specific matter that is under dispute or as one's general mode of behavior
= action by which humans or deities act towards a person in a way that has consequences and can result either in retribution or a reward
